Overview of artificial intelligence regulation

Artificial intelligence (AI) has developed rapidly in recent years and offers great opportunities for Switzerland as a business and innovation location, but also raises new legal challenges regarding transparency and traceability of AI-based decisions. The Federal Council's legislative plan calls for a fundamental decision on the future Swiss regulatory approach in the field of AI.

Artificial Intelligence Regulation Switzerland Federal Council Legislation Rule of Law EU Regulation European Parliament Council Harmonised Rules
